trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> event.
trans-unit.target: Fornece dados para o evento de <see cref="E:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event is raised by the designer host for certain actions on a control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> é gerado pelo host de designer para determinadas ações em um controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> is handled by a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate method, which takes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object as a parameter.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> é tratado por um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> Delegar método, que usa uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto como um parâmetro.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> class supplies a default delegate to handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner> classe fornece um delegado de padrão para manipular o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent>.

trans-unit.source: Custom control designers override the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> methods to process those events for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Designers de controle personalizado substituem o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnClick%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner.OnPaint%2A>, e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplatedControlDesigner.OnTemplateModeChanged%2A> métodos para processar os eventos para o controle na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The designer host initializes a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the type of action on the design surface, and then passes the object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o host de designer uma <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> de objeto para o tipo de ação na superfície de design e, em seguida, passa o objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propriedade representa a região de designer de controle que o evento se aplica.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto indica que tipo de ação:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriedade fornece os argumentos de evento que são específicos para o tipo de ação.

trans-unit.source: For example, the designer host initializes <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objects as follows:
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, o designer host inicializa <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objetos da seguinte maneira:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object when you click a region.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> quando você clica em uma região do objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object when a control is drawn on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> quando um controle é desenhado na superfície de design do objeto.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object when the template editing mode changes for the control on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> quando altera o modo de edição de modelo para o controle na superfície de design do objeto.

trans-unit.source: For more information about events and delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre eventos e delegados, consulte [NIB: eventos e delegados](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).

trans-unit.source: The type of action that raised the event; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType" />.
trans-unit.target: O tipo de ação que gerou o evento. Usado para inicializar o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType" />.

trans-unit.source: The designer region that the action applies to; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region" />.
trans-unit.target: A região do designer à qual a ação se aplica. Usada para inicializar o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region" />.

trans-unit.source: The event arguments associated with <c>eventType</c>; used to initialize the <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: Os argumentos de evento associados ao <c>eventType</c>. Usados para inicializar o <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> class for the type of view event on the design surface.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs" /> para o tipo de evento de exibição na superfície de design.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor is used by the designer host to initialize a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object for the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor é usado pelo host de designer para inicializar um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> de objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.IControlDesignerView.ViewEvent> evento.

trans-unit.source: The designer host passes the initialized <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object to the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegate.
trans-unit.target: O designer host passa o inicializado <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> o objeto para o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventHandler> delegar.

trans-unit.source: Typically, `region` is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, `region` está definido para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> eventos, e `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: Gets the event arguments that are associated with the action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém os argumentos do evento que estão associados à ação que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" /> that contains additional event data that is specific to the type of event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="P:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs" /> que contém os dados de evento adicional que são específicos para o tipo de evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action that is specified in the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriedade fornece os argumentos de evento que são específicos para o tipo de ação que é especificado no <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriedade.

trans-unit.source: For example, when you click a region, the designer host initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event, and then initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property as a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> object.
trans-unit.target: Por exemplo, quando você clica em uma região, o designer host inicializa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> como um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> evento e, em seguida, inicializa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> a propriedade como um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegionMouseEventArgs> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Similarly, the designer host initializes the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property with a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event, or a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> object for a <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Da mesma forma, o designer host inicializa o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriedade com um <xref:System.Windows.Forms.PaintEventArgs> de objeto para um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> evento, ou um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.TemplateModeChangedEventArgs> de objeto para um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriedade é inicializada através de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o tipo de ação que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent" /> that specifies the type of action that raised the event.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent" /> que especifica o tipo de ação que gerou o evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property of the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> object indicates which type of action raised the event:
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs> objeto indica que tipo de ação gerou o evento:

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> eventos.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> event.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> property supplies the event arguments that are specific to the type of action.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventArgs%2A> propriedade fornece os argumentos de evento que são específicos para o tipo de ação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.EventType%2A> propriedade é inicializada através de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor.

trans-unit.source: Gets the designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: Obtém a região do designer à qual o evento se aplica.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> that the action applies to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Web.UI.Design.DesignerRegion" /> se aplica a ação.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property represents the control designer region that the event applies to.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propriedade representa a região de designer de controle que o evento se aplica.

trans-unit.source: Typically, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property is set for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> events, and `null` (`Nothing` in Visual Basic) for <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> and <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> events.
trans-unit.target: Normalmente, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propriedade está definida para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Click> eventos, e `null` (`Nothing` no Visual Basic) para <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.Paint> e <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEvent.TemplateModeChanged> eventos.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> property is initialized by the <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.Region%2A> propriedade é inicializada através de <xref:System.Web.UI.Design.ViewEventArgs.%23ctor%2A> construtor.
